results.title: Mechanisms and effects of metformin on skeletal muscle disorders
results.text_hl: A clinical study showed that combined treatment with @CHEMICAL_Arginine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001120 @@@L-arginine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ positively affected @<m>DISEASE_Hypokinesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018476 @@@hypokines

citations.NLM: Shang R, Miao J. Mechanisms and effects of metformin on skeletal muscle disorders Front Neurol. 2023;14():1275266. PMID: 37928155

results.title: Movement disorders related to antidiabetic medications: a real-world pharmacovigilance study.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Among 11,729 cases of motor adverse events in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, six categories of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Complications @DISEASE_MESH:D048909 @@@drMD@@@ were significantly associated with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ medications. Noticeably, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was revealed to drastically increase the incidence of @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease_Secondary @DISEASE_MESH:D010302 @@@parkinsonism@@@ (adjusted ROR:3.97; 95 %CI (3.03, 5.19), p = 5.68e-24), @<m>DISEASE_Hypokinesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018476 @@@bradykinesia@@@ (adjusted ROR:1.69; 95 %CI (1.07,2.59), p = 0.02) and irregular @DISEASE_Hyperkinesis @DISEASE_MESH:D006948 @@@hyperkinesia@@@, including @DISEASE_Chorea @DISEASE_MESH:D002819 @@@chorea@@@, @DISEASE_Choreoathetosis_Hypothyroidism_And_Neonatal_Respiratory_Distress @DISEASE_MESH:C567034 @@@choreoathetosis@@@ and @DISEASE_Athetosis @DISEASE_MESH:D001264 @@@athetosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhao Y, Fei L, Duan Y. Movement disorders related to antidiabetic medications: a real-world pharmacovigilance study. Prog Neuropsychopharmacol Biol Psychiatry. 2024 Aug 22;135():111128. PMID: 39181309
